= !AtEnd method =

*Project:* [ShellFoldersUnit Shell Folders Unit].

*Unit:* _PJShellFolders_. 

*Class:* _[TPJSpecialFolderEnum TPJSpecialFolderEnum]_

{{{
function AtEnd: Boolean;
}}}

== Description ==

_!AtEnd_ tests whether the end of the special folder enumeration has been reached.

The function returns true when all the special folder identifier values have been returned and false otherwise.
